mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.customer_user_id customerUserId, a.charge_item_id chargeItemId FROM tb_charge_manager a INNER JOIN tb_charge_notice_item c ON a.charge_item_id = c.charge_item_id WHERE a.deleted = 0 AND a.company_id = #{params.companyId} AND a.receivble_status IN ( 0, 1 ) AND a.abrogate_status = 0 AND a.hang_up_status = 0 AND a.ownership_period_begin >= #{params.ownershipPeriodBegin} AND a.ownership_period_end <= #{params.ownershipPeriodEnd} AND c.charge_item_id = #{params.id}
